institution: Human Resources Development Service of Korea
category: Global Job Support Business Rules/Article 18 (Support for Activation of Overseas Employment Business)
contents: Article 18 (Support for revitalizing overseas employment projects) ① The chairman may operate a mentoring system that connects prominent figures related to overseas expansion (mentors) with job seekers who want to expand overseas (mentees), and budgets for the costs and operating expenses accordingly. Support can be provided within the scope of ., ② The Chairman of the Board may provide overseas employment settlement support funds to support the early and stable settlement of young people who have succeeded in finding overseas employment and to promote overseas employment. Revised 2020. 9. 11.
